author: ethdreamer
content: Ok so... it feels like receipts, witnesses, merkle proofs, and merkle branches all the same thing..

author: djrtwo
content: Merkle proofs and branches are generally the same thing. I suppose a branch might jut lead to one leaf, whereas a proof could be more expansive to many leaves

author: djrtwo
content: Receipts are something checked into a commitment that can later be consumed

author: djrtwo
content: Witnesses are more general than just merkle trees

author: djrtwo
content: Its generally a proof against some commitment. We use witnesses when talking more abstractly about things becusse there are viable alternatives to merkle trees/proofs, e.g. polynomial commitments
